title: Icon | Part 1 of 2 | FULL MOVIE | Action, Cold War | Patrick Swayze | 2005 | Frederick Forsyth novel

sources.title: Icon | Part 1 of 2 | FULL MOVIE | Action, Cold War | Patrick Swayze | 2005 | Frederick Forsyth novel
sources.description:
Frederick Forsyth's Icon PART ONE: The manifesto of a new Russian presidential candidate has been found—a disturbing blueprint for returning his country to a military dictatorship. Only one ex-CIA operative is qualified to stop him and life and death fight to save the future of Russia and its people has begun.

Watch Part 2 here: https://youtu.be/kivOj415vhU

Cast: Patrick Swayze, Annika Peterson, Ben Cross, Jeff Fahey, Patrick Bergin, Niko Nicotera, Marta Kondova, Michael York, Joss Ackland

Look for an early appearance from Game of Thrones actor Tom Wlaschiha as 'Mercedes Driver' in Icon

2005

Directed by actor/director Charles Martin Smith, who gained fame as Terry in the iconic movie American Graffiti, where he performed alongside fellow actor turned director Ron Howard.

For another epic Patrick Swayze mini-series, watch King Solomon's Mines: https://youtu.be/IUyHsIocEAg

#patrickswayze #coldwar #thrillermovies #actionmovies #spymovie
